original_text: If, however, the spot is unchanged and has not spread in the skin but has faded, it is a swelling from the burn, and the priest shall pronounce them clean; it is only a scar from the burn.
korean_text: 만일 색점이 여전하여 피부에 퍼지지 아니하고 빛이 엷으면 화상으로 부은 것이니 제사장이 그를 정하다 할 것은 이는 화상의 흔적임이니라

sentences.original_text: If, however, the spot is unchanged
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 그 반점이 변하지 않고

sentences.original_text: and has not spread in the skin
it is a swelling from the burn
and the priest shall pronounce them clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그들을 정하다고 선언할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: it is only a scar from the burn
